body_html:
As @jeremy-rutman said, this is likely an out-of-memory issue. When I get this error, I can fix it every time by unplugging my external monitor. This frees up GPU memory immediately, and I'm then able to run predictions with TF. Another fix that seems to work is if I close my million Chrome tabs.

Note that running as root did not fix it for me.

body:
As @jeremy-rutman said, this is likely an out-of-memory issue. When I get this error, I can fix it every time by unplugging my external monitor. This frees up GPU memory immediately, and I'm then able to run predictions with TF. Another fix that seems to work is if I close my million Chrome tabs.

Note that running as root did not fix it for me.
